## Source: ossf-malware-analysis (1aea1a60f074d92d58e8e1644f08af16097bc4fc496a7acc2b60f586ce504017)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'microsoft_kiota_http' @ 6.0.1 (rubygems) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
